channel.title: Npc's wont stop attacking and following me when i die
channel.description: How can i stop Npc's from attack after you die or tele. they just keep following you ??

item.title: Npc's wont stop attacking and following me when i die
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

[quote=“mrx229, post:3, topic:429203”]well this is the server i downloaded
http://uppit.com/iy8bd1uijx3a/xEpicz_source.rar[/quote]

I’m not going to download the server to track down exactly what’s wrong, and then tell you. You wouldn’t learn anything that way.

The problem is that when the player dies, the Npcs aren’t clearing their state, and thus will follow the player all the way across the map if they have to, because the Npc still thinks it’s in combat.
